verses.verse: Now <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> she had <S%H3205>borne<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7200>visit<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And when <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, he <S%H3947>took<s%> her and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her by <S%H6031>force.<s%>

And he was <S%H1692>deeply<s%> <S%H1692>attracted<s%> to <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and he <S%H157>loved<s%> the <S%H5291>girl<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3820>tenderly<s%> to her.
So <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to his father <S%H1>Hamor,<s%> <S%H2544>saying,<s%> <S%H559>"Get<s%> me <S%H3947>this<s%> <S%H2088>young<s%> <S%H3207>girl<s%> for a <S%H3207>wife.<s%>"

Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that he had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter;<s%> but his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were with his <S%H4735>livestock<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> so <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2790>kept<s%> <S%H2790>silent<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> in.
Then <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the father of <S%H1>Shechem<s%> <S%H7927>went<s%> out to <S%H3318>Jacob<s%> to <S%H3290>speak<s%> with him.

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in from the <S%H7704>field<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it;] and the <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H6087>grieved,<s%> and they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> a <S%H5039>disgraceful<s%> <S%H5039>thing<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H7901>lying<s%> with Jacob's <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> for <S%H3651>such<s%> a <S%H3651>thing<s%> ought not to be <S%H6213>done.<s%>

But <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H2836>longs<s%> for your <S%H1323>daughter;<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> her to him in <S%H802>marriage.<s%>
"And <S%H2859>intermarry<s%> with us; <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to us, and <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for yourselves.

"Thus you shall <S%H3427>live<s%> with us, and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be [open] <S%H6440>before<s%> you; <S%H3427>live<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> in it, and <S%H270>acquire<s%> <S%H270>property<s%> in it."

<S%H7927>Shechem<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> to her father and to her <S%H1>brothers,<s%> "If I <S%H251>find<s%> <S%H4672>favor<s%> in your <S%H2580>sight,<s%> then I will <S%H5869>give<s%> <S%H5414>whatever<s%> you <S%H834>say<s%> to me.

<S%H7235>"Ask<s%> me ever <S%H3966>so<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H4119>bridal<s%> <S%H4119>payment<s%> and <S%H4976>gift,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> according as you <S%H559>say<s%> to me; but <S%H5414>give<s%> me the <S%H5291>girl<s%> in <S%H802>marriage.<s%>"

But Jacob's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> and his father <S%H1>Hamor,<s%> with <S%H2544>deceit,<s%> and <S%H4820>spoke<s%> to them, <S%H1696>because<s%> he had <S%H834>defiled<s%> <S%H2930>Dinah<s%> their <S%H1783>sister.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "We <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H6190>uncircumcised,<s%> for that would be a <S%H2781>disgrace<s%> to us.

<S%H389>"Only<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> [condition] will we <S%H225>consent<s%> to you: <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> us, in that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> of you be <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%>

then we will <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to you, and we will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for ourselves, and we will <S%H3427>live<s%> with you and <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>
"But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to us to be <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> then we will <S%H3947>take<s%> our <S%H1323>daughter<s%> and <S%H1980>go.<s%>"
Now their <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H3190>seemed<s%> <S%H3190>reasonable<s%> to <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> Hamor's <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> did not <S%H309>delay<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H2654>delighted<s%> with Jacob's <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> Now he was <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H3513>respected<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> of his father.

So <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H428>"These<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> are <S%H8003>friendly<s%> with us; therefore let them <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H5503>trade<s%> in it, for <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3027>enough<s%> for them. Let us <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in <S%H802>marriage,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to them.

<S%H389>"Only<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> [condition] will the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H225>consent<s%> to us to <S%H3427>live<s%> with us, to <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among us be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> as they are <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

"Will not their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and their <S%H7075>property<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H929>animals<s%> be ours? <S%H389>Only<s%> let us <S%H225>consent<s%> to them, and they will <S%H3427>live<s%> with us."

And <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3318>went<s%> out of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and to his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> was <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H3318>went<s%> out of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when they were in <S%H3510>pain,<s%> that <S%H8147>two<s%> of Jacob's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> Dinah's <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H983>unawares,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male.<s%>

And they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%> from Shechem's <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>
Jacob's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> upon the <S%H2491>slain<s%> and <S%H962>looted<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they had <S%H2930>defiled<s%> their <S%H269>sister.<s%>

They <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds<s%> and their <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H5892>city<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H7704>field;<s%>

and they <S%H7617>captured<s%> and <S%H962>looted<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> and their <S%H802>wives,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> that [was] in the <S%H1004>houses.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> "You have <S%H5916>brought<s%> <S%H5916>trouble<s%> on me, by <S%H887>making<s%> me <S%H887>odious<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> among the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites;<s%> and my <S%H4962>men<s%> being <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number,<s%> they will <S%H622>gather<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> me and <S%H5221>attack<s%> me and I shall be <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> I and my <S%H1004>household.<s%>"
But they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Should he <S%H6213>treat<s%> our <S%H269>sister<s%> as a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>?"
